org.sbml.squeezer.io
Interface MessageListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
MessageProcessor
public interface MessageListener

Processes messages that have been sent to this object and writes them to a given PrintStream. It can be used as an alternative to System.out because it is very easy to let messages appear, e.g., in a File or on a GUI element.

Since:
1.3
Author:
Andreas Dräger andreas.draeger@uni-tuebingen.de
